name: Lonely Racer 3D
description:
LONELY RACER 3D 

It is a casual racing a made with Unity Game Engine . It is a very simple and casual racing game . It is simple and interesting and I hope that you will enjoy the game.

Minimum specs: 

  • 64-bit processor
  • 4GB RAM
  • 2GB free space in Hard Disk
  • Windows 64-bit operating system(It is available for windows only.)

I am 14 years old and it took me a lot of hard work to make this game. I am giving this game for free but, if you like you may donate me some amount to support my development.
